name: OLI
description:
*Game does not have support to controller*

Do you believe in dreams ?

OLI its a brazilian indie short 2D game with a dark and mysterious setting.

In this game you play as Oliver, a boy who is looking for a way out of an inhospitable city, for that he will have to go through some challenges and different locations of this place to find out what is happening and finish this nightmare.

OLI is composed of simple mechanics, which are:

WALK - keys A and D of the keyboard.


JUMP - Key ESPACE of the keyboard.


INTERACT WITH OBJECTS - keys J or K (depending on the situation).
